Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Lao Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with new Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Chaleune Warinthrasak who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
